doc.after: The rapid economic and socio cultural development of late medieval society in Europe created favorable intellectual and technological conditions for Gutenberg s invention the entrepreneurial spirit of emerging capitalism increasingly made its impact on medieval modes of production fostering economic thinking and improving the efficiency of traditional work processes The sharp rise of medieval learning and literacy amongst the middle class led to an increased demand for books which the time consuming hand copying method fell far short of accommodating 12
